description: File format that enables JPEG and other bitstreams to be exchanged between a wide variety of platforms and applications.  For JPEG encodings, JFIF_1_02 is more widely adopted.
name: ISO/IEC 10918-3:1994, Annex F. Still Picture Interchange File Format (SPIFF).

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">still-image</field><field name="filenameExtension">jpg, jpeg, spf, spiff, jls</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
